title: A Painter's Studio
provenance: Eugene V. Thaw Collection; Christie's, France, March 17, 2005, lot 435
medium: Brush and watercolor and gouache on off-white wove paper
description: This finely painted interior features a drawing school or copying studio. The large center table in the Empire style, grand crystal and gilt-bronze chandelier, and bust, at left, of Charles X, probably modeled on a painting by Jacques-Louis David, are all indicative of Neoclassical design in France.
name: Drawing
